original_text: And David became more and more powerful, because the Lord Almighty was with him.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 함께 계시니 다윗이 점점 강성하여 가니라

sentences.original_text: And David became more and more powerful
because the Lord Almighty was with him
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 주께서 그와 함께 계셨기 때문입니다
